sentences.english: Shawn boomed. "There is endless bounty there for both of us.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩低声说，“那儿会给我们俩无尽的礼物。

sentences.english: I bet Sean Avery has an opinion on this..
sentences.chinese: 我打赌肖恩艾弗里对这件事会有看法。

sentences.english: Seán's arms became very tired from fanning away the flies.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩的武器变得非常疲惫由范宁把苍蝇。

sentences.english: This was a pressure cooker of a night for Johnson.
sentences.chinese: 对于肖恩来说，昨晚是一个倍感压力的夜晚。

sentences.english: Seen was particularly cranky and quarreled with another little boy.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩的脾气特别暴燥，他和另一个小男孩吵了起来。

sentences.english: Seán helped Bridget bury the mayor in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩帮助布里奇特埋葬市长在花园里。

sentences.english: Sean joined the Royal Navy in 1991 as a missile-man.
sentences.chinese: 1991年，肖恩加入皇家海军成为一名导弹发射兵。

sentences.english: Sean also indicated that his concentration levels increased tremendously after practicing yoga.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩还说，在练习瑜伽后，他集中注意力的水平大增。

sentences.english: When Bridget came home, she asked Seán what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 当布里吉特回到家，她问肖恩发生了什么事情。

sentences.english: Shawn and Walt were around the front of the church looking at the bell tower while I was exploring the back area.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩和沃尔特在教堂前部检查灯塔而我在后面察看。

sentences.english: It was that grace, many say, that gave Liukin the edge over the small, muscled Shawn Johnson in the all-around.
sentences.chinese: 很多人说是优雅给了柳金在全能中战胜肖恩的机会。

sentences.english: In the end, the policemen decided that Seán was just a simpleton.
sentences.chinese: 最后，警察判断肖恩是一个傻瓜。

sentences.english: Suddenly Wester rose from his seat, circled the table and dropped to his knees by Shaun's side.
sentences.chinese: 突然韦斯特站起来，绕过桌子，跪倒在肖恩的身边。

sentences.english: Bitzer is the Farmer's faithful sheepdog and also good friend to Shaun.
sentences.chinese: 比泽尔是农夫的忠实牧羊犬，也是肖恩的好兄弟。

sentences.english: Johnson never stopped smiling and politely clapping for her opponents.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩从来没有停止微笑，总是礼貌地为对手鼓掌。

sentences.english: They hit Seán one last time and went away in disgust.
sentences.chinese: 他们打肖恩最后一次和厌恶的走了。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Logue or Rogge (name)/Jacques Rogge, president of International Olympic Committee (IOC)
